channel.title: Poss facelifted victims appear white
channel.description:
#### What happened? I disconnected and reconnected due to bad connection and a "Knight" who had died had his class name appear white instead of blue, we later found out he was actually a poss who jumped. He was the only dead person with a white name.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? His class name should've appeared blue since poss used facelift. I was the only one seeing this the others saw it as normal.
#### Steps to reproduce: Im not sure how to reproduce it but I guess you should disconnect and reconnect at the end of a night when poss jumped?
#### Comments: Although this might be a rare bug I believe it can be exploited since it basically tells you if the person who died was a possessor or not.
